title: Alpha Update don't download.
body:
First of all, my English is bad.
But here is the thing.
I have deleted LoL, but i wanted to play it again, so i download it. But now i don't have the Alpha Client.
If someone can help me, say it.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: To answer your problems Riot created a page to help you [HERE](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230175788-League-Client-Update-FAQ) is the link.
so i just wait for the next update?

You can upgrade to the Beta Client at any time using the dedicated button in the Legacy Patcher, as shown in the screenshot below:

https://imgur.com/a/GbgFI

If you have any further issues upgrading from there on out, please let me know.

I have tried that, but it don't work. When click on **update now** it does nothing but when i click on **LAUNCH** after that it says that there is something wrong with the update and that I must download the Alpha Client again.
You can find the FAQ for the new Beta Client here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230175788-League-Client-Update-FAQ
